item.title: With Demo App
item.description: Cloud Composer # Deploy with CloudShell Description # This sandbox will deploy a Cloud Composer List of the components used in this sandbox: Network Cloud Composer Environment Dataflow Pipeline Example Cloud Storage Bucket BigQuery Table Note: additional details are available in Cloud Composer Guide Setup # NOTE: If you want to undeploy or update an existing stack please proceed directly to Step 3 - Recover

item.title: Just Composer
